description: Frances Perkins is one of the most influential women in the history of our nation, one whose influence can and should be an inspiration for all Americans — women and men alike.
title: This Labor Day, remember Frances Perkins

description: ABC News "This Week" co-anchor Jonathan Karl pressed Colorado Gov. Jared Polis (D) over Vice President Harris's apparent shift away from "Medicare for All," to which the governor argued it is "not a one size fits all solution," for the health care debate. Speaking with Polis on Sunday, Karl played a series of clips from...
title: ABC anchor presses Gov. Polis on Harris's 'Medicare for All' stance

description: Medical experts are advising people to take precautions to avoid the West Nile virus, which Dr. Anthony Fauci is still recovering from after an illness he said was worse than any other he had experienced.
title: These states have the most cases of West Nile, the virus that left Dr. Fauci hospitalized
